import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { AppContext } from '../context/AppContext' const Pagination = () => { const {page, handlePageChange, totalPages} = useContext(AppContext); //we are defining many thing like useState and function in Context and we can get all these // by calling like this , const { Jo bhi chahiye isme likh do} = useContext(AppContext); return(
{ page > 1 && () } { page < totalPages && () }

Page {page} of {totalPages}

) } export default Pagination
